TEXT.TITLE: ZURN <ZRN> BUYS ANTI-POLLUTANT EQUIPMENT
TEXT.BODY: Zurn Industries Inc said it acquired technology to control potentially toxic gases from polluting the atmosphere at various stationary sources. The equipment was purchased from <Proctor and Schwartz> for an undisclosed amount. Reuter
